abstract_summ: Since the first family cluster of COVID-19 cases identified in Shenzhen in early January, most of the local transmission occurred within household contacts.Our study shows high communicability of COVID-19 and the enormous risk for severe acute respiratory syndrome 2 virus transmission during mass gatherings.At least 246 cases of coronavirus disease (COVID-19) have been linked to nightclubs in Seoul, South Korea.We analyzed transmission of coronavirus disease outside of the Daegu-Gyeongsangbuk provincial region in South Korea.In March 2020, a wedding in Jordan led to a large outbreak of coronavirus disease (COVID-19).
title_summ: Effect of Nonpharmaceutical Interventions on Transmission of Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome Coronavirus 2, South Korea, 2020.Large Outbreak of Coronavirus Disease among Wedding Attendees, Jordan.Coronavirus Disease Exposure and Spread from Nightclubs, South Korea.Household transmission of COVID-19, Shenzhen, January-February 2020
title_abstract_phrases: Our study shows high communicability of COVID-19 and the enormous risk for severe acute respiratory syndrome 2 virus transmission during mass gatherings.Effect of Nonpharmaceutical Interventions on Transmission of Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome Coronavirus 2, South Korea, 2020.We analyzed transmission of coronavirus disease outside of the Daegu-Gyeongsangbuk provincial region in South Korea.Since the first family cluster of COVID-19 cases identified in Shenzhen in early January, most of the local transmission occurred within household contacts.At least 246 cases of coronavirus disease (COVID-19) have been linked to nightclubs in Seoul, South Korea.In March 2020, a wedding in Jordan led to a large outbreak of coronavirus disease (COVID-19).
